description: This file contains several shell functions for system management, including process checking, MAC address retrieval, log synchronization, system reboot, and uptime retrieval. It includes external configuration files and defines functions used for system monitoring and maintenance tasks.

methods.name: processCheck
methods.description: Checks if a process with a given name is running, returns 1 if not running, 0 if running.

methods.name: getMacAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the interface specified by the environment variable ESTB_INTERFACE.

methods.name: syncLog
methods.description: Synchronizes log files from a temporary path to a persistent log path, concatenating log contents and clearing temporary logs.

methods.name: rebootFunc
methods.description: Performs system shutdown procedures, including saving power state, syncing logs, and forcing a reboot.
